summary: Three separate stories of children from different places seeking to find their missing fathers.
cast: Carmen Maura|Héctor Suárez|Vanessa Bauche|Susana González|Sanâa Alaoui|Ignacio Guadalupe|Héctor Echemendia|Naoufal Azzouz|Adrian Alonso|Jorge Milo|Nuria Badih|Silke|Martha Higareda|Manolo Caro|Julián Villagrán|Samuel Claxton|Tamara Castellanos|Jorge Martínez|Alejandro Lago|Ronny Bandomo Casanova|Marian Badih|Adrian Marquez|Miguel Pizarro
title: Al otro lado
